prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon that resembles a giant iceberg with sharp edges and a snowy texture.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter, with icy blue colors and a sturdy physique.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a frozen fortress, featuring glacial patterns and intimidating size.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a massive ice block, with rugged surfaces and a frosty appearance.
Design an ice-type creature with a sleek, angular shape and frosty accents, ideal for high-altitude battles.
Give me a Pokemon that blends into a snowy environment, featuring shades of blue and white with unique ice formations.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a frozen mountain, showcasing icy blue tones and a solid, imposing form.
